statements: SELECT * FROM BudgetData WHERE department_name = 'Finance';
SELECT id, department_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > 50000;
SELECT id, department_name, expenditure_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE date_reported = '2022-01-31';
SELECT department_name, budget_amount, expenditure_amount FROM BudgetData ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC;
SELECT id, department_name, budget_amount, date_reported FROM BudgetData WHERE department_name = 'HR' ORDER BY budget_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData WHERE department_name = 'Engineering' ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT department_name, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM BudgetData GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT id, department_name, budget_amount, expenditure_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > expenditure_amount;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT department_name, AVG(budget_amount) AS avg_budget FROM BudgetData GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY avg_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetData ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CostBenefitAnalysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Cost';
SELECT department_name, fiscal_year FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM CostBenefitAnalysis JOIN BudgetData ON CostBenefitAnalysis.budget_id = BudgetData.budget_id;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > 5000 AND fiscal_year = 2022;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetData ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT department_name, fiscal_year, budget_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE department_name LIKE '%IT%' AND fiscal_year IN (2022, 2023);
SELECT b.department_name, c.analysis_type, c.benefit_amount - c.cost_amount AS net_profit FROM CostBenefitAnalysis AS c JOIN BudgetData AS b ON c.budget_id = b.budget_id;

SELECT b.department_name, SUM(c.benefit_amount) AS total_benefit, SUM(c.cost_amount) AS total_cost FROM CostBenefitAnalysis AS c JOIN BudgetData AS b ON c.budget_id = b.budget_id GROUP BY b.department_name;
SELECT id, department, budget_amount, expense_amount FROM budget_data;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, end_date FROM policies ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE cost_benefit_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT result_id, analysis_name FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT id, department, budget_amount, expense_amount FROM budget_data;
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cost_benefit_ratio, analysis_date FROM analysis_results ORDER BY cost_benefit_ratio DESC;
SELECT department, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM budget_data GROUP BY department HAVING total_budget > 10000;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM ProjectDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT maker_name, email_address, phone_number FROM PolicyMakers
SELECT project_name, cost_estimate, benefit_estimate FROM ProjectDetails JOIN CostAnalysis ON ProjectDetails.project_id = CostAnalysis.project_id
SELECT * FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > expense_amount ORDER BY budget_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount, expense_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE budget_amount > 10000 AND expense_amount < 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT maker_name, email_address, phone_number FROM PolicyMakers WHERE maker_name LIKE 'A%' OR maker_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY maker_name ASC;

SELECT p.project_name, c.cost_estimate, c.benefit_estimate FROM ProjectDetails p INNER JOIN CostAnalysis c ON p.project_id = c.project_id WHERE c.cost_estimate > c.benefit_estimate ORDER BY p.project_name ASC, c.analysis_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectDetails WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetData;
SELECT category, budget_amount FROM BudgetData WHERE actual_amount > budget_amount;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, title FROM PolicyMakers WHERE title = 'CEO';
SELECT * FROM BudgetData ORDER BY category ASC, budget_amount DESC;
SELECT id, department_name, department_head FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE budget_amount > 10000.00;
SELECT id, expense_date, amount FROM Expenses WHERE project_id IN (SELECT id FROM Projects WHERE budget_amount > 5000.00);
SELECT name, title FROM PolicyMakers WHERE title = 'Director' OR title = 'Manager';
